title: Magic Shot v1.2
description:
MAGIC SHOT is a very special FRENCH BILLIARDS video game.

More than 2700 unique levels :

- Easy to get, hard to master
- Lift your day with some colour therapy
- Enjoy the peaceful and evocative journey of "Meditation", the expert highscore chase of "Purity" and the frantic hypnosis induced by "Insanity".
- Amazing electronic music created by Renaud BÃƒÂ©dard using LittleBits

Based on traditional French Billiards, players have to touch both the yellow and red balls with the white cue ball, in a single shot. But If only it was that simple! The table morphs after each successful play.

Download it now! Pay once and play forever !
No in app purchase

Handcrafted in London by Nerial with music by Renaud BÃƒÂ©dard

What's New:

As many people are now really mastering Meditation mode, we have decided to hide a secret at the end of the game (level 2763). Is it the end or a different beginning ?
